creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
JMeterProperty.clone() currently returns Object; it should return JMeterProperty.

All the existing implementations return an instance of JMeterProperty, so would not need any code changes.

This would improve the code as various casts can then be removed.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
